channel.title: How do I do this?
channel.description:
Okay, so I tried adding a custom shop. So far, I have added NPC to autospawn.config Then I added a new shop to Shop.config And I also added a new item id to Item.config
I THINK I did everything correctly, but for some reason I just can't trade the NPC. The NPC is a shop assistant. Can anyone help me ?

item.title: How do I do this?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Search for wanneshop in client.java until something like this appears

} else if (NPCID == 1305) { // Agnar Food Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; // Aubury Magic Shop

Under that post this

} else if (NPCID == ###) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##;

Change the first set of #s to the id of the npc you want to run the shop. Change the second set of #s to the shop id.

Read full topic
